name: nurturing flower
description:
To raise frequencies and explore new paths to meditation, healing and joy. Nurturing flower is a hoax, a crypto, a mandala - a language that can be perceived in many ways, only to lead to something new.

Guided Meditation:
Focus on the centre of the Flower.

You are in this inner space,
I am - I am here.
I, whole, human, spirit and body
Am, physical, vision and soul.
This life was granted to me,
By the choice of vibrational causes
And for the time that I choose to be
Therefore, to belong here.
World is chaos and order,
I inhabit this space as I choose to.
This is me, I.

Dimensions: 2048 × 2048
For Guided Meditations, Healing Therapies and more, you can follow me on social media @islandofspectrum (IG) and @sunburnseffect (TW), and request a Guided Meditation Soundtrack. Available to all buyers.
